titleStmt.title: A vindication of the authority, constitution, and laws of the church and state of Scotland in four conferences, wherein the answer to the dialogues betwixt the Conformist and Non-conformist is examined / by Gilbert Burnet ...
titleStmt.author: Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715.

notesStmt.note: Numerous errors in paging; numbers 113-142 omitted.
Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
